item.title: The Cape :30
item.description:
The Cape :30

Filmed for Warner Brothers and DC Comics to promote the Superman Hall of Heroes. Shot on Red Epic flying on a MoVi stabilizer through Zeiss SuperSpeed lenses. Filmed on location in Charlotte, NC working for Flying PIg Studio.

item.title: Cage by Sallie Ford and the Sound Outside
item.description:
Cage by Sallie Ford and the Sound Outside

A music vid for Sallie Ford and the Sound Outside from the new Album "Dirty Radio". Created by Hobey Ford (Concept, Direction, Puppets & Editing), David Bragg (Compositing, Effects work and Editing) and Shane Peters (Cinematography & Editing) in Asheville, NC.

item.title: HappyFeet
item.description:
HappyFeet

This is "HappyFeet" by on Vimeo, the home for high quality videos and the people who love them.

item.title: Tyler Ramsey-A Long Dream
item.description:
Tyler Ramsey-A Long Dream

A Studio South Episode. My super talented friend Tyler (taller) Ramsey with some of his heart wrenching solo work. Tyler makes some good music...straight from his soul to yours.

item.title: Hometown Security
item.description:
Hometown Security

The 2005 winning short film from Asheville created for the 48hr film project. This Action/Adventure genre film tells the story of 2 locals and thier dealings with the tourism economy of Asheville. Winner of Best Director, Best Motion Graphics, Best Soundtrack and Best Ensemble Cast, as well as Best Film.

item.title: Malcolm Holcombe
item.description:
Malcolm Holcombe

A Studio South endeavor. Gritty and raw, Malcolm is the real deal. This was shot by Dave Bragg and myself, and edited by Dave as well.

item.title: Gary Jules "Falling Awake"
item.description:
Gary Jules "Falling Awake"

A Studio South treat. Shot at Echo Mountain for a Daytrotter Session. Rhyno and myself on cam, Dave Bragg editing. Note the combination of my super sweet dolly and that killer ceiling at Echo....and Gary's nice blue hat that sets it all off.

item.title: Arizona "Don't Have The Body"
item.description:
Arizona "Don't Have The Body"

A music video for Arizona, directed by Hobey Ford and Shane Peters

item.title: Mr. Clean "Clean Getaway"
item.description:
Mr. Clean "Clean Getaway"

A spec spot for Mr. Clean Magic Eraser.

item.title: New Rock "Starve"
item.description:
New Rock "Starve"

Tom Chalmers is starving for some good Rock and Roll. Can he find it?
